channel.title: FLF - China Compass
channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.
channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: E** Faces Nashville Sentencing with Joyful China Memories and a Moving Song! [China Compass]
item.description:
On this special episode of the China Compass Podcast, Evangelina faces her upcoming Nashville sentencing (July 30, 2024) with faith and joy.

Then we talk through many happy (and scary) China memories, including her near escape (when I was deported).

Finally, she shares how my little deportation book (Unbeaten.vip), was a blessing to her (esp. the Appendix: Remember My Chains), then plays and sings the beautiful and powerful song, Remember Me.

She wrote this song about interceding for the persecuted partly based on my message, and partly from her own experience in US Prisons. 

As always, the China Compass Podcast is brought to you by www.PrayforChina.us!
item.author: FLF, LLC
item.itunes:author: FLF, LLC
item.itunes:summary: On this special episode of the China Compass Podcast, Evangelina faces her upcoming Nashville sentencing (July 30, 2024) with faith and joy.

item.title: China’s Take on Trump Shooting, Scissor Robbers in Guangdong (Canton) [China Compass]
item.description:
Welcome to the China Compass Podcast (from Lima, Peru)! Today, I start by looking at China's "take" on the assassination attempt on former president Trump, and how the Commies use the news for their own propaganda purposes...

A nation under strain: What the Trump assassination attempt reveals about America

https://www.chinadaily.com.cn/a/202407/16/WS669660aea31095c51c50e67b.html

Trump T-shirts that flooded Chinese retail sites after the shooting have disappeared

https://www.nbcnews.com/news/world/trump-assassination-attempt-shooting-china-t-shirts-disappear-online-rcna162042

*China Compass is brought to you by Pray for China: www.PrayforChina.us --- Follow @chinaadventures for daily prayer updates!

Today's featured province is Guangdong (aka, Canton). After a quick overview of this heavily populated region, it's story time. I talk about the time I was almost robbed with a pair of scissors while taking a midnight nap, my first experience with Chinese beggars, and my first encounter with the Chinese police, that almost stopped my career in China even before it got started. 

*Unbeaten is my story of being arrested, interrogated and deported from China in 2018: www.Unbeaten.vip

Finally, we tackle some new China Compass Q&A, followed by William Borden's account of the Guangdong "boat people" in 1904.

*Borden of Yale is a classic missionary biography written by Hudson Taylor's DIL: www.BordenofYale.com
item.author: FLF, LLC
